verbs.description: j d martinez [V: will] play in game 3 after rolling ankle report says boston red sox outfielder and designated hitter j d martinez will start in game 3 of the world series according to espn martinez led the majors with 130 rbis he drove in two runs in each of the two wins at fenway park and is 3 for 7 in the series martinez rolled his right ankle on a double in the opener he stayed in and playing while sore delivered a key hit wednesday night i do not know where but j d martinez is going to play david j phillip boston red sox jd martinez alex cora boston david j phillip boston red sox manager alex cora game red sox j d martinez
